roomTypes.Description standart: Experience comfort and convenience in our well-appointed Standard Rooms, designed to offer a serene retreat after a busy day. Each room features cozy bedding, modern furnishings, and essential amenities to ensure a pleasant stay. Guests can enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a spacious work desk, and an en-suite bathroom stocked with high-quality toiletries. Whether you're traveling for business or leisure, our Standard Rooms provide a comfortable base for your stay.
roomTypes.Description lux: Elevate your stay with our Lux Rooms, where sophistication meets comfort. These rooms are thoughtfully designed with plush furnishings, premium bedding, and tasteful decor to create an inviting and luxurious atmosphere. Enjoy enhanced amenities including a larger flat-screen TV, a minibar stocked with premium selections, a comfortable seating area, and a spacious bathroom with a rain shower and deluxe bath products. Guests will also appreciate the added touches like a complimentary breakfast and evening turndown service. Perfect for those seeking a touch of luxury during their visit.
roomTypes.Description premium: For the discerning traveler, our Premium Rooms offer an unparalleled level of luxury and comfort. These expansive rooms feature elegant decor, high-end furnishings, and state-of-the-art technology to cater to all your needs. Indulge in the plush king-size bed, relax in the separate living area, and enjoy the convenience of a fully stocked minibar with gourmet snacks and beverages. The spacious marble bathroom boasts a deep soaking tub, a rain shower, and exclusive designer toiletries. Premium Rooms also include VIP services such as private check-in, complimentary airport transfers, and access to our exclusive lounge with complimentary refreshments throughout the day. Experience the pinnacle of hospitality with our Premium Rooms.

about.title_1: A Legacy of Elegance and Excellence
about.text_1: Welcome to Admin Hotel, where luxury meets history. Nestled in the heart of the city, Admin Hotel has been a beacon of elegance and sophistication since its inception in 1924. Our storied past is a testament to our commitment to providing unparalleled hospitality and timeless charm.
about.text_2: Admin Hotel was founded by visionary entrepreneur Charles Davenport. With a passion for hospitality and an eye for detail, Davenport transformed a modest building into a grand establishment that quickly became the talk of the town. The hotel’s opulent architecture, inspired by the Art Deco movement, captivated guests and set a new standard for luxury accommodation.
about.text_3: Throughout the 1930s and 1940s, Admin Hotel thrived as a hub of social and cultural activity. It was a favorite among Hollywood stars, dignitaries, and world travelers. The hotel's elegant ballroom hosted countless glamorous events, from high-society weddings to charitable galas. Our staff, renowned for their impeccable service, made every guest feel like royalty.
about.text_4: In the 1960s, Admin Hotel underwent a significant renovation to incorporate modern amenities while preserving its historic charm. This period saw the introduction of our rooftop garden, offering breathtaking views of the city skyline, and the launch of our award-winning fine dining restaurant, The Davenport Room. These innovations ensured that Admin Hotel remained at the forefront of luxury hospitality.
about.text_5: Today, Admin Hotel continues to honor its rich heritage while embracing the future. We have integrated sustainable practices throughout our operations, ensuring that our guests can enjoy a luxurious stay that is also environmentally responsible. Our rooms and suites are equipped with the latest technology, providing a seamless blend of classic elegance and modern convenience.
about.text_6: At Admin Hotel, we believe that true luxury lies in the details. From the moment you step through our doors, you will be enveloped in an atmosphere of warmth and refinement. Our dedicated team is committed to making your stay unforgettable, whether you are here for business, leisure, or a special occasion.
about.text_7: We invite you to become part of the Admin Hotel story. Experience the legacy of a landmark institution that has been setting the standard for luxury hospitality for over a century. Whether you are a returning guest or visiting us for the first time, we look forward to welcoming you to our home.
about.text_8: Welcome to Admin Hotel – where history, elegance, and modern luxury converge.
